website_summaries.verdict: A durable sneaker that's made to last - and the proof is in the weight.
pros: Comes in wide widths, which can be hard to find in kid's sizes
Sturdy sole with plenty of tread
Light when child stomps rather than button-activated
Lining is anti-microbial to help prevent odors
Reinforced toe helps to keep these fun shoes in good shape
cons: A few reports of insoles coming loose and bunching inside shoe

customer_reviews.title: Don't Stand Up to the Test of Time or Toddler
customer_reviews.text: We've had these shoes for about two months and already they need replacing. The front has split apart from the fabric allowing dirt and water to get into the shoe. the velcro is fraying. We have not washed them at all, only normal wear and tear of an almost 5-year-old. For being Stride Rite I am disappointed with the overall build of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Zam

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved. Mom, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box these are great shoes. Then after a couple wears I noticed that the insole doesn’t stay in these. At all. Like. Not even a little. Sigh. And like other reviews mentioned the rubber is starting to get messed up. My son wanted these and no other shoe though so I went with them. He does love them. And once they’re on they’re perfect so that’s why I only took off one star. If the kid approves. that’s enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfy Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been great for my active 5 year old twins! We love the color! They stand out and go with a lot of things. My boys love how brightly they light up. They have held up very well during rough play and they wash up quite nicely which is unusual for a lighted shoe. We love Stride Rite shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Janellemp

customer_reviews.title: Love this for thick wide toddler feet!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a super wide foot and a thick foot. We have been doing xxwide and this was a regular wide. We were so surprised that they fit looser than other brands and xxwide sizes! He was ecstatic because he loves light up shoes but they rarely come in a wider toe box! Will definitely be ordering a different color for him so he can have options for once!
customer_reviews.author: DoublehapaFAM

customer_reviews.title: Inner lining problems
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes and he wears them to basketball and school. My only complaint is that the bottom lining is completely unattached and now it’s all bunched up.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Through my own mistake, had to order 3 times
customer_reviews.text: When I bought the 1st pair of these shoes, they were too small for my grandson so I ordered another size even before I returned the first pair. The second pair came in and I then returned what I thought was the smaller pair, but in a moment of brain cramp, I accidentally returned the correct pair!! Totally my fault, but I had to then reorder the correct pair and finally return the wrong size and now my grandson absolutely LOVES them! He loves to show me how they light up, and they look super cute on him as well. He is 5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Green shoes that look and fit great!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son wanted green shoes. I let him pick them out. He absolutely loves them! He grew out of the size 1 shoes so I just ordered the 1.5 and in wide width. They fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Luckeegurl

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son well and have held up for the month and a half he’s worn them. I’m generally on the lookout for decent snd inexpensive shoes and these fit both criteria.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Dorsch

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son great and he loves how they light up. Only issue I have is they are pretty heavy for kids shoes. Would have loved it if they could be a little more lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Minarin

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these. They’re not the cutest, but they certainly aren’t as ugly as some light up shoes out there! Hah. They look like the pictures. Light up with stomping rather than a button which was important to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but insole deteriorated
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seemed great, are great. It’s just the insole peeled apart and bunched up at the toe and I had to request a replacement from stride rite, for which they obliged. This occurred slightly after the amazon return window. This may have slipped past QC as the other insole was fine, and seems thicker/stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bradford

customer_reviews.title: great shoe, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: great for an active kid, can easily get them on and off, liked the color choices. fit well, no issues. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: VJB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my son, who has big wide feet and they fit him very well. He loves the light up feature as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lilialexa17

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Got a 13.5 for my son who has large wide feet. They fit perfect. It’s hard to find shoes that fit my kids and stride rite are the best!
customer_reviews.author: KristenG

customer_reviews.title: Holding up to 5 year-old son's rugged play
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are still lighting up with plenty of toe and tread after 2 months of serious use. Velcro is still working, too.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Barton

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. They are a decent shoe. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: HappyLife

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. My little guy loves them. They were a bit on the higher side.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy shoes wear down in two months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in February 2020 and already they need replacing. The front has split apart from the fabric and plastic is ripped off. This is normal wear and tear of an almost 5-year-old. I have bought several Stride Rite shoes and have never seen such a poor shoe
customer_reviews.author: great game if you like shooting games

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves them
customer_reviews.text: They fit true to size and my grandson just loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Insole is a flop
customer_reviews.text: We usually love Stride Rite shoes and have bought them for years, but this one is not up to the normal SR quality. My son was delighted that these light up, but the insoles quickly started shifting around on him. I didn't realize how bad the problem was until he wore them on a family hike, and the insoles were crawling out the side of them! It was ridiculous. We thought about trying to glue them back in, but we couldn't think of a glue that would stay pliable enough for using inside a shoe and not leave a hard, irritating ridge.
customer_reviews.author: UnJane

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not too long after having these for my 4 year old (after many pairs before with few kids), the insole began to peel off the foam and the toe bed wore through. It became uncomfortable for my toddler and it only improved by removing the foot bed. Reaching out to stride rite did not improve anything. Of all the stride rite shoes from amazon or anywhere, these surprisingly were the least durable and worst quality. I ensure I won't re buy this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cross

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Made2Play Little Boys Neo Light-Up Sneaker
product_meta.description:
Mud is no match for the Stride Rite Made2Play collection. The washable NEO is a premium comfortable and stylish sneaker: a go-to for running, jumping and more. AND since the shoes are easy on/off, your toddler can leave his mess at the door.

Stride Rite designs and engineers footwear specifically to meet the needs of growing children. Stride Rite's mission is to encourage kids and support parents by developing and marketing products that help children embrace life's possibilities and adventures with confidence. Stride Rite shoes aren't like any other shoes you'll buy. They're better. With more than 85 years of experience, they've learned a few things about their craft. Stride Rite is the one company that's been helping kids run, jump, leap, grow, and playfully express themselves since 1919.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately not_applicable from arch
Hook & loop closure for easy on/off and adjustability
Rubber outsole for ultimate traction and durability
